duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation and configuration of C++ and Java applications
Support with necessary technical improvements for particular system according to client's needs and requirements
Software troubleshooting on-live systems using SQL, logs, network and systems tools
Bridge between developers, architects, designers and with external and internal customers in case of any changes and new system implementation
Provide technical support to customer on the application and its functionality
Document, review and edit requirements and technical specifications and recommendations related to projects
Solve complex business problems using differing technologies and systems views across multiple functional domains
Ensure issues are identified, tracked, reported and resolved in a timely manner
Consistently deliver high-quality service to customers
Ensures that approved methods, processes, and tools are consistently used

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related field (Master's preferred)
